metadata.title: CVE-2024-40896 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In libxml2 2.11 before 2.11.9, 2.12 before 2.12.9, and 2.13 before 2.13.3,the SAX parser can produce events for external entities even if custom SAXhandlers try to override entity content (by setting "checked"). This makesclassic XXE attacks possible.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-40896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1
python3-libxml2 - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1').
